snippet.title: Colorful 未来 (Official Trailer) - DEMO available now!
snippet.description:
Colorful未来 is a story about a girl going through an artist block in the most important moment of her life.  This game is about finding help in unexpected places and facing your problems when you think there's no hope.

Find out more:
https://honeybunny-of.itch.io/

Theme song: 
“Harmony”
by JayJen | https://soundcloud.com/jayjenmusic
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US
